description: She's one of the most sought after models in the business and on Thursday, Kendall Jenner showed exactly why.
title: Kendall Jenner puts on leggy display in a golden silk dress in Barcelona
title_page: Kendall Jenner puts on leggy display in a golden silk dress in Barcelona | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's one of the most sought after models in the business and on Thursday, Kendall Jenner showed exactly why.
The 20-year-old was pictured heading out in Barcelona, Spain, where she is currently working as the face of Mango, wearing an incredible silk dress in a golden hue.
The very sexy number showed off her flawless skin, due to its very sexy off-the-shoulder design and short length.
Scroll down for video
She looks great! Kendall Jenner headed out in an off-the-shoulder golden dress in Barcelona, Spain on Thursday as she showed off her model figure
Wow thing: The very sexy number showed off her flawless skin, due to its very sexy off-the-shoulder design and short length
She gave it a very Nineties feel with a thick black choker which blended into her raven locks as she cut a low key figure, shielding her eyes as she stepped out into the street.
Her pretty dress had a ruched neckline and Kendall was certainly working it as she headed out with her entourage in tow.
She wore her raven locks down and in a straight style and gave her height some extra inches with a pair of sky high strappy sandals.
See more of the latest Kendall Jenner news and pictures as she puts on a leggy display
What a look! The model put on a very leggy display as she posted a picture of her look to her Instagram account that day
Earlier in the day, Kendall wrote the word 'Barcelona' next to a love heart on Twitter as she showed her love for the city.
She also posted a snap of herself wearing her lovely outfit to Instagram, next to an emoji of the Spanish flag.
She's modelled for major brands all over the world. But Kendall Jenner also turned heads earlier this week as her latest campaign for Calvin Klein was up there with her most steamy shoots.
Step back in time: She gave her look a very Nineties feel with a thick black choker which blended into her raven locks as she cut a low key figure, shielding her eyes as she stepped out into the street
Maybe later: She seemed a little camera shy as she covered up her face with a mobile phone
Important accessory: She carried her phone in hand at all times as she went from place to place
In a new image for the brand's spring 2016 collection, the top model strips to her underwear as she relaxes in bed.
With her eyes closed, the dark-haired beauty tucks one hand under her white vest while another rests behind her head as she shows off her white Calvin Kleins.
A slick of shimmering bronze eyeshadow and bronzer complete the model's naturally chic look.
Both Kendall and her CK campaign co-star Justin Bieber have shared sneak peeks at the photo series and are also seen in a video for the brand's new spring 2016 collection, alongside other stars including FKA twigs, Kendrick Lamar and Fetty Wap.
VIP: The star was surrounded by an entourage as she made her way out on a tour of the city
